sentences.c: Remind sb. of his duties, acquaint sb. of sth. , notify of…
sentences.cn: 提醒某人做某事， 通知某人做某事，通报某人。

trans.cn: 对……感到生气：因某事或某人而感到愤怒或生气。

sentences.c: "Well, perhaps not," said Alice in a soothing tone: "don't be angry about it."
sentences.cn: “也许不，”爱丽丝用安抚的语气说道，“别生气了。”

sentences.c: Don't be angry about this.
sentences.cn: 不要对此发脾气。

sentences.c: You should be angry about his promise.
sentences.cn: 你应该为他的失信而生气。

trans.cn: 对……感到焦虑：对某事或某人感到担忧、不安或紧张。

sentences.c: To stress or be anxious about a situation.
sentences.cn: 对某种情况感到紧张或焦虑。

sentences.c: The moderates have plenty to be anxious about.
sentences.cn: 暖和派有许多问题要担忧。

sentences.c: I told him not to be anxious about making money.
sentences.cn: 我跟他说不用担心赚钱的事。

trans.cn: 小心，注意：表示对某事物或行为的警惕，提醒他人在处理某事时要谨慎。

sentences.c: I think you should be careful about talking of the rebels as heroes.
sentences.cn: 我认为你还是当心点好，别把叛乱分子说成是英雄。

sentences.c: You should be careful about how to talk with them.
sentences.cn: 你应该要注意与他们交谈的方式。

sentences.c: Something else they need to be careful about is medicines.
sentences.cn: 他们还需要注意的是药物。

sentences.c: Help us to be certain about things we do not see.
sentences.cn: 求祢帮助我们来确信未见之事。

sentences.c: I'm afraid I can't be certain about that until next week.
sentences.cn: 恐怕要等到下星期我才能确定。

sentences.c: Even if success is uncertain and hard to quantify, you can be certain about failure.
sentences.cn: 虽然成功具有不确定性，很难量化，但你却能够确定失败。

trans.cn: 对……感到好奇：对某事物或某人感到好奇，想要了解更多信息。

sentences.c: Kids will be curious about it when they reach a certain age.
sentences.cn: 当孩子到达一定年龄时，他们对这个会很好奇。

sentences.c: And then she be would be curious about what her new intended did.
sentences.cn: 随后她会很好奇地问起自己的新爱人是做哪一行的。

sentences.c: Another way to shine, says Jason Levin: Be curious about the acquiring company's culture.
sentences.cn: 詹森·莱文指出，另一种让你在并购中脱颖而出的方法，是要对收购方的文化保持好奇心。

sentences.c: I am sure you will not be disappointed about these body painting pictures.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定你看了之后绝对不会失望。

sentences.c: If you think that your life will transform overnight just because you think happy thoughts every day then you are about to be very disappointed.
sentences.cn: 假如你认为你的生活会因为你每天都回想美好的回忆而一夜改变，那么你可能会非常失望。

sentences.c: INVESTORS hoping for calm after U.S. Banks reported large write-downs last month are likely to be disappointed: European Banks are about to come clean, and the outlook isn't pretty.
sentences.cn: 在美国各银行上个月纷纷宣布进行大规模资产冲减后，投资者多么希望能有片刻的安宁。但这一愿望恐怕是无法实现了，欧洲银行的业绩也即将出炉，而且苗头也不太妙。

trans.cn: 对……感到非常兴奋和热情：指对某事物或某人感到非常兴奋和热情。

sentences.c: Go to a car boot sale and you may be excited about what you find.
sentences.cn: 去跳蚤市场，你可能会对你发现的东西感到兴奋。

sentences.c: Have something to be excited about today.
sentences.cn: 为今天做点让人兴奋的事情。

sentences.c: A: You must be excited about leaving for America.
sentences.cn: 你对去美国一定很兴奋。

sentences.c: Trust it, be glad about it, and use it.
sentences.cn: 信赖它，为它感到欣喜，运用它。

sentences.c: Very glad to be free and active once more，Tithonus jumped about in the fields all day，chirping happily to Aurora.
sentences.cn: 泰索尼斯很高兴能再自由行动，就整天在田野里乱跳，同时很愉快地对欧洛拉叫着。

sentences.c: If anyone has any advice about where to stay and what to see, I'll be glad to get it.
sentences.cn: 如果有什么好的建议比如在哪里住和看些什么，希望大家不吝赐教。

trans.cn: 对……感到高兴：感到满意、愉快或快乐的情绪，通常是因为某个原因或事件。

sentences.c: I've learned to be happy about getting up so early, because I know there're going to be a few good moments every day there.
sentences.cn: 我学会了为早起而快乐，因为我知道每天都会有一些美好的时刻。

sentences.c: What do I have to be happy about?
sentences.cn: 我有什么值得高兴的事情？

sentences.c: There is little to be happy about in this report, in other words.
sentences.cn: 换言之，这份报告没有一丝让人们欢欣鼓舞的地方。

trans.cn: 对……抱有希望：对某事物或某种情况持有积极、乐观的态度或期望。

sentences.c: There is every reason to be hopeful about the future.
sentences.cn: 我们有理由对未来充满希望。

sentences.c: Here is a good reason to be hopeful about the future: it might help you stay alive.
sentences.cn: 对未来充满希望有一个很好的理由：就是这样可能让你长寿。

sentences.c: You have something to be hopeful about now instead of being sad about something in the past.
sentences.cn: 你有什么事情是有希望的是对过去的东西现在不是难过。

trans.cn: 热爱某人或某事物：指对某人或某事物有强烈的喜爱或热情。

sentences.c: Green will be mad about us.
sentences.cn: 格林先生会气疯的。

sentences.c: And the main thing I just try to do is stay focused on trying to do a good job, and try to be understanding that sometimes people are going to be mad about things.
sentences.cn: 我试着去做的事情主要就是集中精神把工作做好，而且也要理解有时候人们会为一些事情而失去理智。

sentences.c: I just bet them 500 apiece that I could piss on your bar, piss on your floor, on your phone and piss on you and not would you not be mad about it, you'd be happy.
sentences.cn: 我跟他们每人赌了500块，赌我可以尿在你的酒吧里，尿在你的地板上你的电话上还有你身上，而你不但不会发火，反而会很高兴。

trans.cn: 对……感到紧张或焦虑：指对某事或某人感到紧张、焦虑或担心。

sentences.c: It's completely normal for you to be nervous about transferring schools.
sentences.cn: 你对转校感到紧张是完全正常的。

sentences.c: Otter's not the fellow to be nervous about any son of his before it's time.
sentences.cn: 奥特不是那种会提前担心儿子的人。

sentences.c: Barack Obama should be nervous about 2012.
sentences.cn: 2012年，奥巴马要当心。

trans.cn: 对……挑剔，讲究，注重：对某事物有很高的要求，对细节非常关注。

sentences.c: Heavy science namely be particular about nutrition.
sentences.cn: 重科学即讲求营养。

sentences.c: Make yourself at home. People nowadays seem not to be particular about the rules of ordering dishes.
sentences.cn: 别客气。现在的人似乎不讲究点菜的规矩了。

sentences.c: More what is more, the rather that, mood of gem gal be particular about is gentle, and high temperature can cause mentaltension, itself with gem gal gentle run in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 更何况，瑜伽讲求心境平和，而高温会导致精神紧张，本身就与瑜伽的平和背道而驰。

sentences.c: So there's nothing to be sad about.
sentences.cn: 所以，没有什么可以难过的。

sentences.c: The moon has nothing to be sad about.
sentences.cn: 月亮没什么好悲哀的。

sentences.c: Sometimes, setting a daily time to be sad about the change can help.
sentences.cn: 有时不妨每天空出时间来感伤一下变化。

trans.cn: 认真对待：对某事或某人持认真态度，不轻视或不漫不经心。

sentences.c: Finally, be serious about love.
sentences.cn: 最后，严肃第对待爱情。

sentences.c: Please be serious about your work.
sentences.cn: 请认真对待你的工作。

sentences.c: So I must be serious about every exam.
sentences.cn: 那么我一定要认真地对待每一次考试。

trans.cn: 确定的，毫无疑问的：表示对某事物有明确的信心或确信。

sentences.c: People may not be sure about life on Mars until a sample of life is brought back.
sentences.cn: 人们可能不确定火星上是否有生命，直到一个生命样本被带了回来。

sentences.c: Be sure about the purpose of writing the feature story.
sentences.cn: 确定好写特写的目的。

sentences.c: That is scary, and we cannot be sure about changes in the future.
sentences.cn: 这是可怕的，因为我们无法确定未来会发生什么变化。

trans.cn: 忧虑：对某事或某人感到担忧或忧虑。

sentences.c: It's only human nature to be worried about change.
sentences.cn: 对变革有忧虑不过是人之常情。

sentences.c: Who might be worried about the pollution of the world?
sentences.cn: 谁可能会关心世界的污染问题？

sentences.c: Every time the exam is over, I will be worried about the results.
sentences.cn: 每次考试结束，我都会担心结果。

trans.cn: 对……生气：感到愤怒或不满的情绪针对某人或某事。

sentences.c: This was their mother at her worst. Her voice was strident, she was ready to be angry at anyone.
sentences.cn: 这是他们的母亲最糟糕的情形。她声音刺耳，随时会对人发脾气。

sentences.c: They'll all be angry at me.
sentences.cn: 他们都生我的气。

sentences.c: The second is that you may be angry at another person or object.
sentences.cn: 第二个是，你可能会反对另一个人或生气。

trans.cn: 不擅长，不善于：指某人在某方面缺乏技能或能力。

sentences.c: Because all states must be bad at something.
sentences.cn: 因为每个州肯定会有些缺点。

sentences.c: Might they be bad at record keep 50% so it's not actually 60% percent it was only 50%.
sentences.cn: 可能他们在记录上不好,所以实际上不是60%而是。

sentences.c: Moreover, even signatory countries may be bad at abiding by the convention, especially when it means enforcing the return of children to a parent alleged to have been abusive.
sentences.cn: 此外，即使是缔约国也会违反公约，尤其在执行将孩子遣送到被判有虐待倾向的一方的时候。

trans.cn: 擅长于，善于：指某人在某方面有出色的技能或能力。

sentences.c: The difference between Chinese traditional painting painters and calligraphers is to be clever at using pen not at writing good characters.
sentences.cn: 好中国画家与书法家的区别是，不是为了写好字而是为了用好笔。

sentences.c: The clever men at Oxford know all that there is to be knowed.
sentences.cn: 牛津大学的聪明人知道所有该知道的事。

sentences.c: He looked at me calmly, and said, "See, grandmother is crying!" One day, you'll understand that it's harder to be kind than clever.
sentences.cn: 他平静地看着我说：“看，祖母在哭！”总有一天，你会明白，善良比聪明更难。

trans.cn: 对……感到失望：感到对某事或某人的期望没有达到而感到失望。

sentences.c: You must be disappointed at losing the chance.
sentences.cn: 失去这次机会，你肯定很失望吧。

sentences.c: I told them that they would be disappointed at the news.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他们，听到这个消息，他们会失望的。

sentences.c: However, I suspect many will be disappointed at quite how keenly he talked down the importance of electoral reform in some parts of the interview.
sentences.cn: 但是，很多人也会对他在采访中极力强调选举的重要性，想要说服大家感到很失望。

trans.cn: 精通于：对某一领域或技能有深入的了解和掌握。

sentences.c: Be expert at...
sentences.cn: 在…方面是专家。

sentences.c: We feel deeply that it is a sign of weakness to "change out minds. " Competent scientists, however, must be expert at changing their minds.
sentences.cn: 我们深深地感到改变主意是一种弱点的表现，然而，有能力的科学家必须善于改变看法。

sentences.c: The development team that handles the model may be expert at writing DB2 COBOL programs, or EJB entity beans, or some other technology appropriate for storing and manipulating enterprise data.
sentences.cn: 处理模型的开发小组可以是开发DB 2 COBOL程序、EJB实体bean或适用于存储和操纵企业数据的其他技术的专家。

trans.cn: 擅长于：具有某种技能或才能，能够做某事很好。

sentences.c: You need manual dexterity to be good at video games.
sentences.cn: 玩好电子游戏手要灵巧。

sentences.c: Viruses tend to be good at surviving when a computer system crashes.
sentences.cn: 病毒往往在电脑系统瘫痪时仍然存在。

sentences.c: Learn to be good at thinking.
sentences.cn: 学会善于思考。

trans.cn: 生气；对某人感到愤怒或不满

sentences.c: In fact, they were being ridiculous to fight and be mad at each other over nothing.
sentences.cn: 事实上，他们无缘无故地争吵和生对方的气是很可笑的事情。

sentences.c: He must be mad at you.
sentences.cn: 他一定生你的气。

sentences.c: Don't be mad at me, like it's all my fault.
sentences.cn: 不要生我的气，好象这都是我一个人的错一样。

trans.cn: 擅长于：在某个领域或活动中表现出快速和敏捷的能力。

sentences.c: I don't want to get big either, because I want to be quick at all times.
sentences.cn: 同时我也不想发胖，因为我想一直保持我的速度。

sentences.c: He may be quick at understanding, but he's not capable of remembering anything.
sentences.cn: 他可能理解很快，但他不能够记住。

sentences.c: So be sure to be quick at finding out if anybody is wearing anything new or impressive and remember to say, “You look awfully smart in this new shirt!
sentences.cn: 所以，要善于及时发现别人是否穿了新的或令人印象深刻的衣服，并要记住说：“你穿这新衬衣真靓！”

trans.cn: 擅长于：具有高超的技能或能力，在某个领域或活动中表现出出色的技巧和熟练度。

sentences.c: It means to be very skillful, to be very great at something, you've gotta repeat it so many times.
sentences.cn: 它的意思是要做到对一样东西很熟练，很出色，你必须得重复很多遍。

sentences.c: The story might not be true. But the story tells us that Zhang is really skillful at painting.
sentences.cn: 这个故事并不真实，但从故事里我们可以知道张画画很高明。

sentences.c: Be renowned Both at home and aBroad for exquisite workmanship, skillful knitting and elegant designs.
sentences.cn: 以工艺精细，针法灵巧多样，图案典雅大方而闻名中外。

trans.cn: 做某事慢：在某个活动或任务上表现得慢或缓慢。

sentences.c: Clerk: That's a good idea. And remind them to be slow at the beginning, not to run into the railings.
sentences.cn: 工作人员：那是个好主意，另外还要提醒他们在开始的时候慢一点，别撞到护栏上。

sentences.c: When a JFFS is mounted, the structural details are read into memory, which can be slow at mount-time and consume more memory than desired.
sentences.cn: 挂载JFFS时结构细节将读取到内存中，这将延缓挂载时间并消耗更多的内存。

sentences.c: The rate at which hair grows can be agonizingly slow.
sentences.cn: 头发生长的速度可以慢得令人苦恼。

trans.cn: 渴望，迫切希望：强烈渴望或迫切期待某事的发生或实现。

sentences.c: For those who find it difficult not to be anxious for other people.
sentences.cn: 给那些很难不为他人担忧的人们。

sentences.c: Therefore don't be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Let the day's own trouble be sufficient for the day.
sentences.cn: 千万不要为明天忧虑，因为明天自有明天的忧虑，一天的难处一天担当就够了。

sentences.c: That cannot be good news for Ms Pelosi and her anxious colleagues in the House.
sentences.cn: 对于佩洛西女士和她焦急的同僚而言，这可不是什么好消息。

trans.cn: 对……有害：指某种行为或物质对某人或某物有负面影响或危害。

sentences.c: A passion for cooking does not necessarily have to be bad for your waistline.
sentences.cn: 热衷于做菜并不一定会使腰围变粗。

sentences.c: According to a new study, our love for jeans may be bad for Earth.
sentences.cn: 根据一项新的研究，我们对牛仔裤的喜爱可能对地球不利。

sentences.c: However, if the plastics are small enough, they can find ways into our bodies and stay there for a long time, which can be bad for our health.
sentences.cn: 然而，如果塑料足够小，它们可以找到进入我们身体的途径，并长时间停留在体内，这对我们的健康不利。

trans.cn: 前往某地：表示某人或某物正在前往某个地方。

sentences.c: This episode is bound to be a deep embarrassment for Washington.
sentences.cn: 这一事件必然使华盛顿大为尴尬。

sentences.c: The innovator will search for alternate courses, which may prove easier in the long run and are bound to be more interesting and challenging even if they lead to dead ends.
sentences.cn: 创新者会寻找其他的道路，从长远来看，这些道路可能更容易，也必定更有趣，更有挑战性，即使它们走到死胡同。

sentences.c: I shall be weather-bound for half an hour.
sentences.cn: 因为天气的缘故，我得在这里叨扰半个小时。

trans.cn: 因……而受到赞扬或庆祝：因某种特质、成就或行为而备受赞扬或庆祝。

sentences.c: The festival will be celebrated for nine days.
sentences.cn: 这个节日会连续庆祝九天。

sentences.c: To be celebrated for your intelligence and your talent, rather than for your size-two beauty.
sentences.cn: 不是为了你不错的美貌，而是为了你的智慧和才能而庆祝。

sentences.c: What if I celebrated my small successes instead of being down on myself for what still needs to be done?
sentences.cn: 如果我为自己小小的成功庆祝，而不因为那些仍需要去做的事情而心情低落，那会怎样？

trans.cn: 方便于：适用于某种情况或目的，使事情更加容易或便利。

sentences.c: Will either of those times be convenient for you?
sentences.cn: 这两个时间有一个是您方便的吗？

sentences.c: While owning a motorcar might be convenient for the driver and his passengers, we also have to consider the environmental impact of this type of transportation.
sentences.cn: 虽然拥有一辆汽车对司机和乘客来说可能很方便，但我们也要考虑到这种交通工具对环境的影响。

sentences.c: Would Tuesday be convenient for you?
sentences.cn: 星期二方便吗？

trans.cn: 渴望，热切期待：对某事物或某种情况感到非常渴望或热切期待。

sentences.c: Be eager for We are eager for you to come here.
sentences.cn: 我们热切期待着你们的到来。

sentences.c: The two gangsters seem to be eager for the fray.
sentences.cn: 那两个歹徒似乎唯恐不乱。

sentences.c: Could we be at peace with where we are now, and, be eager for more?
sentences.cn: 我们可以在和平与地方，我们现正和，渴望能有更多的呢？

trans.cn: 以……而闻名：因某种特定的事物、品质或行为而广为人知。

sentences.c: The British are supposed to be famous for laughing at themselves, but even their sense of humour has a limit, as the British retailer Gerald Ratner found out to his cost.
sentences.cn: 英国人本应以自嘲著称，但就连他们的幽默感也有限度，英国零售商杰拉尔德·拉特纳在付出一定的代价之后才明白了这一点。

sentences.c: Its building have to be famous for their beauty or their historical importance.
sentences.cn: 这里的建筑物要出名，必须美观，或具有历史意义。

sentences.c: I want to concentrate on playing volleyball and to be famous for that, not anything else.
sentences.cn: 我希望专心打球，凭借排球上的表现获得关注，而不是其他方面。

trans.cn: 适合于：符合某种要求或标准，能够胜任某种任务或角色。

sentences.c: If you don't pay more attention to your lessons, you will never be fit for anything.
sentences.cn: 如果你不多注意你的功课，你永远无法胜任任何事。

sentences.c: I'll definitely be fit for the final.
sentences.cn: 到决赛时，我肯定能完全恢复。

sentences.c: But he should be fit for the second game against Switzerland — not that he might look it.
sentences.cn: 但是他在第二场对瑞士的比赛中应该能够康复——不过好像他在乎的并不是这些。

trans.cn: 适合，有益于：指某物对某人或某事物有益处或适合。

sentences.c: They'll be good for you.
sentences.cn: 它们对你有好处。

sentences.c: She would be good for the job.
sentences.cn: 她干这工作很合适。

sentences.c: Oh great! That'll be good for Fred.
sentences.cn: 噢，太棒了！那对弗雷德将会很有利。

trans.cn: 感激，感谢：对某事或某人心存感激和感谢之情。

sentences.c: We should be grateful for your help.
sentences.cn: 对您的帮助我会非常感激。

sentences.c: We would be grateful for any information you can give us.
sentences.cn: 如能提供信息我们将感激不尽。

sentences.c: There was a matter of some delicacy on which he would be grateful for her advice.
sentences.cn: 有一件棘手的事，若能得到她的指点，他会感激不尽。

trans.cn: 渴望，迫切想要得到或实现某事：指对某事物或某种经历感到渴望，迫切希望得到或实现。

sentences.c: "That would be grand, certainly," said Alice thoughtfully, "but then--I shouldn't be hungry for it, you know."
sentences.cn: “那太好了，”爱丽丝想了想说，“不过，我不应该为它挨饿，你知道。”

sentences.c: Can we literally be hungry for money?
sentences.cn: 我们是否会对钱有一种饥饿？

sentences.c: In today's world many people appear to be hungry for money.
sentences.cn: 当今世界，有不少人对金钱流露出极度的渴望。

trans.cn: 迟到：指在规定的时间之后到达某个地点或完成某个任务。

sentences.c: It means I'll be late for work but what the heck!
sentences.cn: 那意味着我上班会迟到，不过管它的呢！

sentences.c: I'll be late for school.
sentences.cn: 我上学要迟到了。

sentences.c: We can't be late for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们开会不能迟到。

trans.cn: 对于……是必要的：表示某事对于实现或完成另一件事是必要的。

sentences.c: Exposure to nature has been thought to be necessary for brain development in children.
sentences.cn: 人们一直认为，接触大自然对儿童的大脑发育是必要的。

sentences.c: Such a change may not be necessary for your distribution.
sentences.cn: 对于您所使用的版本可能不需要这种更改。

sentences.c: Dr Heymann: That will be necessary for the countries to negotiate.
sentences.cn: Heymann博士: 这必需由国家进行谈判。

trans.cn: 准备好迎接：做好准备以应对某种情况或事件。

sentences.c: The ship will not be ready for a month.
sentences.cn: 这艘船一个月内将不会准备就绪。

sentences.c: I think he may be ready for a sleep soon.
sentences.cn: 我想他可能准备好了马上睡一觉。

sentences.c: The offices will be ready for occupation in June.
sentences.cn: 办公室将于六月交付使用。

trans.cn: 为……感到抱歉：表示对某人或某事表示歉意或遗憾。

sentences.c: You need not be sorry for her.
sentences.cn: 你们不必为她难过。

sentences.c: I ought to be sorry for myself, too, just now.
sentences.cn: 我现在也应该为自己感到难过。

sentences.c: You will be sorry for this.
sentences.cn: 对此事，你会后悔的。

synos.cn: 为…感到抱歉；为…感到难过

sentences.c: As it ages, these conditions may change and the area around it may no longer be suitable for its offspring.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长，这些条件可能会变，它周围的区域可能不再适合它的后代。

sentences.c: An example of how the connection can influence us is when our weak-ties get in touch and pass on details about jobs they think might be suitable for us.
sentences.cn: 一个关系如何影响我们的例子就是，与我们有弱关系的人联系我们，并告知他们认为可能适合我们的工作的细节。

sentences.c: These regions seem too dry to be suitable for farming.
sentences.cn: 这些地区看来太干燥而不适合农业。

trans.cn: 感激，对……心怀感激：指对某事物或某人心怀感激之情。

sentences.c: He wasn't badly hurt—that's something to be thankful for.
sentences.cn: 他的伤不重，这倒是值得庆幸。

sentences.c: We should be thankful for scientific thinkers like Yuan.
sentences.cn: 我们应该感谢袁先生这样的科学思想家。

sentences.c: This experience has taught me to be thankful for things we have in life.
sentences.cn: 这段经历教会我要对生活中所拥有的一切心存感激。

trans.cn: 因……而闻名：因某种特定的原因或特点而广为人知或闻名。

sentences.c: Well-known figures would be a big plus for the new board.
sentences.cn: 名人会成为新董事会的一大优势。

sentences.c: These licenses can be used over the Internet as well (like an online banking application) because the end user is well known since they must be specifically identifiable for this license.
sentences.cn: 也可以通过因特网使用这些许可（比如在线银行应用程序），因为最终用户是已知的，因而必须被许可明确识别。

sentences.c: That turned out to be very beneficial, since managing an online shop for a well-known brand developed their professional spirit.
sentences.cn: 结果证明这是很用的，因为为知名品牌管理网店能够开发他们的专业精神。

trans.cn: 缺席：不在场，不出席某个活动或场合。
缺少：某物或某人不在某个地方或情况中。

sentences.c: She became so afraid of going to school that she started to be absent from her classes.
sentences.cn: 她变得如此害怕去上学，以至于开始逃课。

sentences.c: This setup allows the HTML-specific code to be absent from your component.
sentences.cn: 这个设置允许特定于HTML的代码从组件脱离。

sentences.c: We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
sentences.cn: 我们坦然无惧，是更愿意离开身体与主同住。

sentences.c: If you spoke in the first person, the word would be different from in the third person.
sentences.cn: 用第一人称讲话，所用的词会完全不同于用第三人称讲话。

sentences.c: I'm also interested in how consumers operate online, and how that online behavior might be different from how they operate offline when they go to the shops.
sentences.cn: 我还对消费者如何在网上操作，以及这种在网上购物的行为与他们在线下去商店购物时的行为有何不同很感兴趣。

sentences.c: It is not at all clear why the costs of serving a highly loyal customer should in principle be different from those of serving any other type of repeat customer.
sentences.cn: 为什么服务一个高度忠诚的顾客的成本原则上与服务其他类型的回头客的成本是不同的，这一点完全不清楚。

trans.cn: 完全不同：与某事物完全不同。

sentences.c: Mr. Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide emissions, though necessary, will be far from cost free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
sentences.cn: 尽管奥巴马的二氧化碳减排计划是必要的，但无论他在这个问题上发表的充满希望的演讲可能会暗示什么，这远不是免费的。

sentences.c: Mr. Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide emissions, though necessary, will be far from cost-free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
sentences.cn: 尽管奥巴马的二氧化碳减排计划是必要的，但这远不是免费的，无论他在这个问题上发表的充满希望的演讲可能会暗示什么。

sentences.c: Be far from dangerous things.
sentences.cn: 远离危险事物。

trans.cn: 免受，免于；没有……的，不受……影响的

sentences.c: "We want people in China to be free from fear or worry," said the song's producer.
sentences.cn: 这首歌的制作人说：“我们希望中国的人们没有恐惧，不再担忧。”

sentences.c: She several times emphasizes this need for protection, need to be free from being torn down from people around them.
sentences.cn: 她多次强调这种保护的需要，需要从周围的人那里解放出来。

sentences.c: Men are not saints; how can they be free from faults?
sentences.cn: 人非圣贤， 孰能无过?

synos.cn: 免受，免于；没有…的，不受…影响的

trans.cn: 免受……的伤害或危险：不受……的威胁或危害。

sentences.c: You might think a bird that could fly so fast would be safe from most types of danger.
sentences.cn: 你可能会认为，一只能飞得如此之快的鸟儿会在大多数危险前安全无恙。

sentences.c: Floating cities will be safe from flooding.
sentences.cn: 漂浮的城市不会被洪水淹没。

sentences.c: The next year, their food would be safe from Bear.
sentences.cn: 接着的那年，他们的粮食将会安全不被熊吃了。

trans.cn: 因……而疲劳：由于某种原因而感到疲劳或疲倦。

sentences.c: I thought the ants would be tired from their daylong work.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些蚂蚁会因为成天劳动而累了。

sentences.c: You must be tired from long flight, please take a rest today.
sentences.cn: 长时间搭乘飞机你一定累了，请你好好休息吧。

sentences.c: You must be tired from the long flight. Please take a rest today.
sentences.cn: 长时间地搭乘飞机您一定累了，今天就请好好休息吧…。

trans.cn: 参与，涉及：与某事或某活动有关联或参与其中。

sentences.c: I don't think we should be concerned in terms of travel to the Middle East or to-to anywhere in the world right now.
sentences.cn: 我不认为咱们现在应该担心前往中东或到世界上的任何地方。

sentences.c: Introduce CE/EMC test requirements for electric & electronic toys, and briefly discuss common issues needed to be concerned in design toys.
sentences.cn: 介绍玩具产品CE认证所需进行的电磁兼容测试及产品中出现的主要问题和解决方法。

sentences.c: But scarcely be concerned in application problem, less convincing theory of solving problems and setting up questions in application problem may be discovered.
sentences.cn: 但对数学奥林匹克应用问题缺乏足够的关注，难以找到令人信服的解题与命题的理论阐述。

ws: to have something to do with

trans.cn: 对……感到失望：对某人或某事感到失望或不满意。

sentences.c: Connie: I hope you won't be disappointed in As pen, Maria.
sentences.cn: 康妮：我希望你在奥斯本不会感到失望，玛丽亚。

sentences.c: I hope so. I just don't want him to be disappointed in me.
sentences.cn: 但愿如此。我只是不希望他对我失望。

sentences.c: My parents will be disappointed in me if I fail in the exam.
sentences.cn: 如果我考试不及格，我父母将为我感到失望。

trans.cn: 从事某事：参与某项活动或工作。

sentences.c: During the first year of the program, students were found to be less likely to transfer schools or be engaged in violent crime.
sentences.cn: 人们发现，在项目的第一年，学生转校或参与暴力犯罪的可能性较低。

sentences.c: I'd be engaged in studying Chinese poetry.
sentences.cn: 因为我会学习中国诗词。

sentences.c: So, it can be engaged in the shipment of wood.
sentences.cn: 对了，它可以用来装载木头。

trans.cn: 熟练掌握：在某个领域或活动中具有丰富的经验和技能。

sentences.c: In this age of information, we should be experienced in using the Internet as a search tool.
sentences.cn: 在这个信息时代，我们应该熟练使用互联网这个搜索工具。

sentences.c: The Chief Executive should be experienced in business administration.
sentences.cn: 总经理应有企业管理经验。

sentences.c: Many of the adverse effects will still be experienced in poor metabolizers.
sentences.cn: 许多不良反应仍然会在代谢不良者身上发生。

trans.cn: 精通于：对某个领域或技能有深入的了解和掌握。

sentences.c: He is said to be expert in English speech.
sentences.cn: 据说，他擅长用英语作演说。

sentences.c: Be expert in...
sentences.cn: 在…方面是专家。

sentences.c: I don't profess to be an expert in this subject.
sentences.cn: 我不敢自诩为这方面的专家。

trans.cn: 在……方面幸运：指在某个特定领域或方面运气好，取得成功或获得好的结果。

sentences.c: However, we may not be so fortunate in the future, experts warned.
sentences.cn: 然而，专家警告，将来我们就不会这么幸运了。

sentences.c: "I never thought I would be a star in a commercial, then this happened. It's very fortunate," Anas said.
sentences.cn: 阿纳斯说：“我从没想过自己能拍广告，而这确实发生了，真是很幸运。”

sentences.c: Nelly, you think you are better and more fortunate than I; in full health and strength: you are sorry for me — very soon that will be altered.
sentences.cn: 耐莉，你以为你比我好些，幸运些；完全健康有力：你为我难过——不久这就要改变了。

sentences.c: Challenge yourself to be honest in your purchases.
sentences.cn: 试着对你要购买的物品诚实一点。

sentences.c: Let us be careful to be honest in all out dealings.
sentences.cn: 让我们小心，在一切我们做的事上诚实不欺。

sentences.c: Paul advised, "Be honest in your evaluation of yourselves."..
sentences.cn: 保罗忠告我们，“要诚实的评价自己…”。

phonetic0: bi ˈɪntrəstɪd ɪn; bi ˈɪntrestɪd ɪn

trans.cn: 对……感兴趣：对某事或某人感到有兴趣，想要了解更多或参与其中。

sentences.c: Be interested in others and they are sure to be interested in you.
sentences.cn: 对别人感兴趣，别人肯定也会对你感兴趣。

sentences.c: He only seems to be interested in personal gain.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只在乎个人的收益。

sentences.c: I thought she might be interested in Paula's proposal.
sentences.cn: 我以为她可能会对保拉的提议感兴趣。

trans.cn: 缺乏：指某物或某方面不足。
不足：指某物或某方面不够充足。

sentences.c: Mrs Merkel may be lack in g high-quality advice.
sentences.cn: 默克尔也许缺少高质量的建议。

sentences.c: There seems to be a lack of appreciation of what is actually going on in the real world.
sentences.cn: 人们似乎缺乏对现实世界中真实情况的了解。

sentences.c: To some extent, they can be ascribed to a distinct lack of a sense of social responsibility among enterprises and individuals, which is of crucial importance in building a better world.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，这可以归因于企业和个人明显缺乏社会责任感，而社会责任感对建设一个更美好的世界至关重要。

trans.cn: 富含，充满：指某物质或某地区具有丰富的某种物质或资源。

sentences.c: Film makers would be rich in the future.
sentences.cn: 电影制作人将来会很富有。

sentences.c: He is believed to be rich in mind.
sentences.cn: 大家都相信他很有头脑。

sentences.c: Complementary foods should be rich in nutrients and given in adequate amounts.
sentences.cn: 补充食品应富含营养，同时要喂养充足。

trans.cn: 擅长于：具有某种技能或能力，能够熟练地运用。

sentences.c: Be skillful in computer.
sentences.cn: 熟悉电脑运用。

sentences.c: During communication, the person you are communicating with USES one of the opposite skills. Therefore, in order to understand each other, everyone must be skillful in all four areas.
sentences.cn: 在交流的过程中，你正在交流的那个人可能正在使用一些相反的能力，所以你必须擅长这四种技能。

sentences.c: Be careful when you are dealing with a multi-thread Web application, because you need to be more skillful to make sure that locale information is accessible anywhere in the application.
sentences.cn: 在您处理多线程的网络程序时，要十分谨慎，因为您需要掌握一定的技巧，以确保在程序的任何地方都能够访问场所信息。

trans.cn: 在某方面取得成功：在某个领域或某项活动中获得成功。

sentences.c: Women do not necessarily have to imitate men to be successful in business.
sentences.cn: 女人无须非得效仿男人才能在商界成功。

sentences.c: You will be successful in whatever you do and you will have a very full and interesting life.
sentences.cn: 你在你做的任何事情中都会很成功，你会拥有非常充实而有趣的生活。

sentences.c: Pisces can handle many different tasks at once and be successful in all of them.
sentences.cn: 双鱼座可以同时处理许多不同的任务，而且都能成功。

trans.cn: 在某方面弱：指在某个领域或方面缺乏能力或表现不佳。

sentences.c: She used to be weak in English.
sentences.cn: 她以前英语不好。

sentences.c: I used to be weak in English.
sentences.cn: 我以前英语很弱。

sentences.c: I always considered myself to be weak in the English language and avoided it.
sentences.cn: 那时我总是觉得自己英语不好，所以逃避它。

trans.cn: 害怕：以一种不合理或不必要的方式害怕事物。

sentences.c: There's nothing to be afraid of.
sentences.cn: 没有什么要害怕的。

sentences.c: There's no need to be afraid of him—he's a big softie.
sentences.cn: 没必要害怕他—他心特好。

sentences.c: They may be afraid of losing you.
sentences.cn: 他们可能害怕失去你。

trans.cn: 感到羞耻，为……感到惭愧：指因为某事或某人而感到羞耻或惭愧。

sentences.c: Peter ought to be ashamed of himself.
sentences.cn: 彼得应为自己感到羞耻。

sentences.c: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.cn: 精神病并不可羞愧。

sentences.c: He knew full well he'd be ashamed of himself later.
sentences.cn: 他十分清楚他以后会为自己感到羞愧。

trans.cn: 意识到，知道：意识到某事或某物的存在或重要性。

sentences.c: Be aware of the terrible strain it can put on a child when you expect the best grades.
sentences.cn: 当你期盼最佳成绩时，要意识到这可能给孩子带来的可怕压力。

sentences.c: Advanced students need to be aware of the importance of collocation.
sentences.cn: 层次较高的学生必须意识到词语搭配的重要性。

sentences.c: As with many technological revolutions, you are unlikely to be aware of it.
sentences.cn: 正如很多技术革命一样，你不太可能意识到它。

trans.cn: 有能力做某事：具备完成某项任务或达到某种状态的能力。

sentences.c: The British Olympic Association (BOA) has said that to earn a slot, a team must be capable of "a credible performance".
sentences.cn: 英国奥运协会（BOA）声称，队伍要拿得出“可信的成绩”才能取得参赛席位。

sentences.c: Such behavior is regarded as "all too human", with the underlying assumption that other animals would not be capable of this finely developed sense of grievance.
sentences.cn: 这种行为被认为“太人类化了”，其言下之意是，其他动物不可能有这种微妙的愤懑感。

sentences.c: Servers and storage must be capable of resizing without impact to users.
sentences.cn: 服务器和存储必须能够在不影响用户的情况下重新调整大小。

trans.cn: 小心，当心：用于提醒或警告某人要注意某种潜在的危险或风险。

sentences.c: Be careful of the nettles—they sting!
sentences.cn: 小心给荨麻扎着—荨麻有刺！

sentences.c: They had to be careful of floating chunks of ice.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不小心漂浮着的厚冰块。

sentences.c: Be careful of fallen power lines.
sentences.cn: 小心倒下的电线。

trans.cn: 确信，有把握，有信心：指对某事物或某种情况感到确信，没有疑虑或不确定性。

sentences.c: If you want to be certain of getting a ticket, book now.
sentences.cn: 要想有把握买到票，现在就得预订。

sentences.c: What Descartes has done is find at least one thing that he can be certain of.
sentences.cn: 笛卡尔所做的就是找到了至少一件他能确定的事。

sentences.c: But nobody can be certain of the outcome.
sentences.cn: 但是，谁也不确定这就是结局。

trans.cn: 喜欢：指对某事物或某人有深厚的喜爱和钟爱。
钟爱：指对某事物或某人有非常深厚的喜爱和珍视。

sentences.c: Do you want him to be fond of you?
sentences.cn: 你想让他喜欢你吗？

sentences.c: He thought over various plans for relief, and finally hit upon that of professing to be fond of Pain-killer.
sentences.cn: 他考虑了各种各样的办法来获得解脱，最后想出了一个办法，那称自己喜欢吃止痛药。

sentences.c: "If I were her ghost—my father would be fond of me," he said.
sentences.cn: “如果我是她的灵魂——我爸爸会喜欢我的。”他说。

trans.cn: 没有……的，摆脱了……的：不再受到某种负担、束缚或疾病的影响。

sentences.c: The marriage was a failure and they both wanted to be free of it.
sentences.cn: 这段婚姻是个失败，他们俩都想从中解放出来。

sentences.c: Museum's special exhibition area will now be free of charge.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的特别展览区现在免费开放。

sentences.c: It was vital that the elections should be free of coercion or intimidation.
sentences.cn: 至关重要的是，选举中不得有胁迫或威逼。

trans.cn: 充满：对某事物感到兴奋或有很多话要说或思考。

sentences.c: You can be full of energy.
sentences.cn: 你可以充满活力。

sentences.c: When you do sports, you will be full of confidence.
sentences.cn: 你做运动的时候会充满信心。

sentences.c: An organization without trust will be full of fear and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 一个没有信任的组织将充满恐惧和怀疑。

trans.cn: 感激，为……而高兴：指对某事感到满意、高兴或感激。

sentences.c: I'd be glad of your help.
sentences.cn: 你若能帮助我，我会非常感激。

sentences.c: In that case, we should be glad of another death.
sentences.cn: 如果是那样的话，我们应该为另一次“死亡”感到高兴。

sentences.c: He replied, 'You mean fortunately.' he explained that I should be glad of the extra exercise that the hill provided.
sentences.cn: 朋友回答说：“你其实很幸运吧，”然后他又解释说，“你应该庆幸有这么一座山给你提供额外锻炼的机会。”

trans.cn: 对……感到紧张或担心：感到对某事或某人紧张、担心或不安。

sentences.c: The horse may be nervous of cars.
sentences.cn: 这匹马可能害怕汽车。

sentences.c: Video games really allowed myself to be me, without having to be nervous of what others thought of me.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏让我做回了我自己，不会担心别人怎么想我怎么看我。

sentences.c: Compared with other countries it is only middlingly good (see chart) and the RBI may be nervous of using too much ammunition.
sentences.cn: 预期他国家相比，它只能算一般般（见上表）而且RBI可能在动用储备上畏首畏尾。

trans.cn: 为……感到自豪：因某事或某人而感到自豪或自尊。

sentences.c: Your achievements are something to be proud of.
sentences.cn: 你的成就是值得骄傲的。

sentences.c: Every right-thinking American would be proud of them.
sentences.cn: 每一个有正义感的美国人都会为他们感到骄傲的。

sentences.c: What should China be proud of?
sentences.cn: 中国应该引以为傲的是什么？

sentences.c: This is a shock task. It'll be no good to be short of hands.
sentences.cn: 这是一项突击任务，人少了不济事。

sentences.c: But at least he will not be short of advice.
sentences.cn: 但至少他不会缺少建议。

sentences.c: Pay in cash be out of cash be short of cash.
sentences.cn: 付现金无现金缺少现金。

trans.cn: 缺乏，不足，不够：指某物或某人在数量、质量或程度上不足或不够。
不愿意，不敢，害怕：指某人因为害羞、不自信或害怕而不愿意做某事。

sentences.c: Don't be shy of telling us the truth.
sentences.cn: 告诉我们真相，不要不好意思。

sentences.c: If you want something to eat, don't be shy of saying so.
sentences.cn: 你要吃点什么，别不好意思说。

sentences.c: She was old enough to be shy of bears, even very small bears like Little Bear.
sentences.cn: 她是一个大人，知道要躲着熊，即使是小比尔这样的小熊。

trans.cn: 对……感到厌烦：对某事或某人感到非常厌烦或不满。

sentences.c: You must be sick of me.
sentences.cn: 你肯定很厌恶我。

sentences.c: I am sure you must be sick of all our noise.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们吵吵闹闹肯定会使您心烦。

sentences.c: You must be sick of all those dice and buttons by now!
sentences.cn: 你现在一定已经对这些小方块和钮扣厌烦了！

trans.cn: 确信，毫无疑问：表示对某事物有确定的信心或把握，没有任何疑问。

sentences.c: England must win this game to be sure of qualifying.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队必须拿下这场比赛才能确保获得资格。

sentences.c: England must win this game to be sure of qualifying for the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队必须拿下这场比赛才能确保获得世界杯的参赛资格。

sentences.c: A lot of people think that it's better to pay for their education so that they can be sure of getting quality.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为最好是自己掏钱受教育，为的是能肯定得到高品质的教育。

trans.cn: 厌倦，对……感到疲倦：指对某事物或某人感到不再有兴趣或满足，希望结束或改变现状。

sentences.c: I'll never be tired of it.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会厌倦。

sentences.c: But she will never be tired of caring about you.
sentences.cn: 但她永远不会厌倦对你的关心。

sentences.c: You'll soon be tired of the game.
sentences.cn: 很快你就会对这种游戏感到厌倦的。

sentences.c: The story of comb would not be worthy of mention, but for a closely related word, no one today associates with it.
sentences.cn: 梳子的故事不值一提，要不是有一个与它密切相关的词，如今没人会联想到它。

sentences.c: Be worthy of people's trust.
sentences.cn: 对得起人民的信任。

sentences.c: You don't need pretenses to be worthy of your own approval.
sentences.cn: 你无需假装赢得自我的认可。

trans.cn: 对某人或某事感到生气或不满：指对某人或某事情感到愤怒、生气或不满。

sentences.c: You can't be angry with these people.
sentences.cn: 你不能跟这些人生气。

sentences.c: Please don't be angry with me. It wasn't my fault.
sentences.cn: 请别冲着我发脾气，不是我的错。

sentences.c: Don't be angry with your parents.
sentences.cn: 不要生你父母的气。

trans.cn: 对……感到厌烦：对某事物或某人感到无聊或不感兴趣。

sentences.c: I think I will be bored with doing the same work everyday, so I prefer a challenging job.
sentences.cn: 我认为每天做同样的工作我会感到厌倦，所以我更喜欢具有挑战性的工作。

sentences.c: I don't think I will be bored with his class.
sentences.cn: 我认为我不会对他的课感到厌烦。

sentences.c: People seem to be bored with more and more singing competitions.
sentences.cn: 人们似乎对越来越多的唱歌比赛感到厌烦了。

trans.cn: 忙于：指某人正在进行或专注于某项活动或任务。

sentences.c: And Mr King can expect to be busy with his pen next year.
sentences.cn: King先生明年很可能还要忙于写信。

sentences.c: By the end of this month we will be busy with company's salary report.
sentences.cn: 这个月的月底我们又将忙于做出公司职工的工资报表。

sentences.c: We should be busy with certain aims that encourage us when we get progress.
sentences.cn: 我们应该忙于某些目标，鼓励我们，当我们得到进步。

trans.cn: 小心，当心：提醒某人对某事物小心谨慎，以免出现危险或错误。

sentences.c: Be careful with that —it cost a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 小心别弄坏那东西，它可值钱了。

sentences.c: She also told me to be careful with it and remember our friendship.
sentences.cn: 她还告诉我要小心对待它，并且记住我们的友谊。

sentences.c: Be careful with daily use.
sentences.cn: 日常使用时要小心。

trans.cn: 关注：指对某事物感兴趣或关心。
担忧：指对某事物感到担心或忧虑。
涉及：指与某事物有关或牵涉其中。

sentences.c: They might also be concerned with other kinds of issues, for example, whether the company is involved in selling arms.
sentences.cn: 他们还可能关心其他类型的问题，例如，该公司是否涉及出售武器。

sentences.c: Women hate it most, since girls are pressurized from an early age to be concerned with appearances of all kinds.
sentences.cn: 女人最讨厌它，因为女孩从小就受到压力，要关注各种各样的外表。

sentences.c: This is the condition for really the lion's share of chemistry, biology, and other kinds of changes we'll be concerned with.
sentences.cn: 这是真正要在化学，生物学和我们将要关注的其他类型变化中占有最大份额的条件。

sentences.c: If Simon had not, early in life, learnt to be content with his life, he might never have been given those chances.
sentences.cn: 如果西蒙在早年没有学会满足于自己的生活，他可能永远不会有这样的机会。

sentences.c: He had to be content with third place.
sentences.cn: 他只好屈居第三名。

sentences.c: He professed to be content with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 他表示对该安排满意。

trans.cn: 对……感到高兴/满意：表示对某事物或某人感到非常高兴或满意。

sentences.c: They found plenty of things to be delighted with, but nothing to be astonished at.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了许多令人高兴的事情，但没有什么令人惊讶的。

sentences.c: They found plenty of things to be delighted with.
sentences.cn: 他们看到了很多令人欣喜的东西。

sentences.c: I wish you knew Miss Andrews, you would be delighted with her.
sentences.cn: 你要是认识安德鲁斯小姐就好了，你会喜欢她的。

trans.cn: 对……感到失望：感到对某人或某事不满意或失望。

sentences.c: My parents will be disappointed with me if I fail to get into college.
sentences.cn: 如果我考不上大学，我的父母会对我失望的。

sentences.c: But it's a good bet that you be disappointed with the results if you only try.
sentences.cn: 但如果你试过却对结果灰心失望也算是个不错的选择。

sentences.c: If the date goes wrong, then you at least will not be disappointed with the food choice.
sentences.cn: 如果约会不顺利，至少不会对食物也很失望。

sentences.c: His fans would already be familiar with Caroline.
sentences.cn: 他的崇拜者们一定已熟悉卡罗琳。

sentences.c: He does not seem to be familiar with research which might have strengthened his own arguments.
sentences.cn: 他对本来可使他的论证更有说服力的研究似乎不太熟悉。

sentences.c: Any of you happened to be familiar with the Greek word for "sun" by chance?
sentences.cn: 你们中有谁碰巧熟悉希腊语中“太阳”的意思？

trans.cn: 对某人诚实：表示坦诚、真实地对待某人，不隐瞒或欺骗。
对某事诚实：表示坦诚、真实地对待某事，不隐瞒或欺骗。

sentences.c: You owe it to your staff to be honest with them.
sentences.cn: 与下属坦诚相待，这是你对他们应有的态度。

sentences.c: To be honest with you, I don't remember what he said.
sentences.cn: 跟你说实话，我不记得他说过什么了。

sentences.c: Be honest with yourself.
sentences.cn: 对自己要诚实。

trans.cn: 患病，生病：指身体出现疾病症状。

sentences.c: Woe unto the wicked! It shall be ill with him: for the reward of his hands shall be given him.
sentences.cn: 恶人有祸了。他必遭灾难。因为要照自己手所行的受报应。

sentences.c: The terminally ill should be allowed to die with dignity.
sentences.cn: 应该允许垂危病人死得有尊严。

sentences.c: When they eventually leave the school they will be totally ill-equipped to deal with the real world.
sentences.cn: 当他们最终离开学校的时候，他们将完全没有准备好应付现实世界。

trans.cn: 对……要有耐心：在与某人或某事交往时，需要保持耐心和宽容。

sentences.c: Remember that working long hours can make them tired, so be patient with them.
sentences.cn: 记住长时间工作会让他们感到疲劳，所以要对他们有耐心。

sentences.c: Teachers ought to be patient with students.
sentences.cn: 教师应该对学生有耐心。

sentences.c: Try to be patient with the people around you.
sentences.cn: 试着耐心地对待你周围的人。

sentences.c: The boss should be pleased with you.
sentences.cn: 上司应该对你满意了。

sentences.c: I think she will be pleased with the hermitage.
sentences.cn: 我想，她一定会喜欢我们这个幽静的小地方。

sentences.c: In all likelihood, though, Baidu won't be pleased with its results.
sentences.cn: 不过，百度很有可能不满意这一结果。

trans.cn: 受……欢迎：指某人或某物在某群体中受到普遍喜爱或欢迎。

sentences.c: In China, Beijing Opera used to be popular with old people while young people didn't like it very much.
sentences.cn: 在中国，京剧过去很受老年人的欢迎，而年轻人则不太喜欢。

sentences.c: The courses seem to be popular with entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 这些课程似乎广受企业家的欢迎。

sentences.c: The concept would surely be popular with consumers.
sentences.cn: 这个概念肯定受消费者欢迎。

sentences.c: Never be satisfied with yourself, or you will fall behind others.
sentences.cn: 永远不要自我满足，否则你会落后于别人。

sentences.c: It rarely makes sense to buy at that high a price for them to be satisfied with being paid off only at par (the full value of the bond).
sentences.cn: 以这么高的价格买进，让他们满足于只按票面价值(债券的全部价值)偿付，几乎没有什么意义。

sentences.c: I would be satisfied with just a wife.
sentences.cn: 只要有个老婆我就满足了。

sentences.c: Be strict with yourself, but be kind to others.
sentences.cn: 严于律己，宽于待人。

sentences.c: Parents should be strict with their children.
sentences.cn: 家长应该严格对待孩子。

sentences.c: A person should be strict with himself, but be kind to others.
sentences.cn: 一个人应该严格要求自己，但要善待他人。

trans.cn: 习惯于：适应某种环境、情况或习惯，使自己变得熟悉或适应于某种事物。

sentences.c: The staff in the company can help new members be accustomed to the life there.
sentences.cn: 公司的工作人员会帮助新进成员习惯那里的生活。

sentences.c: Web authors might be accustomed to specifying target="_new" to specify that a link opens in a new window.
sentences.cn: Web 程序开发员可能已经习惯了用 target="_new" 规定链接打开新的窗口。

sentences.c: This search results page is also different than what you may be accustomed to from the other support pages.
sentences.cn: 搜索结果页面也不同于您所熟悉的其他支持页面。

trans.cn: 对某事物没有意识，或者拒绝注意到对他人来说显而易见的事物：指对某事物缺乏认识或意识，或者故意忽视对他人来说显而易见的事物。

sentences.c: And it is a very scary tyke actually that transform yourself from somebody who would be blind to somebody who would be sighted.
sentences.cn: 实际上，如果你从一个失明的人，变成一个视正常的人也是件十分可怕的事情。

sentences.c: However, blind faith has its limitations. Because if we just focus on how we want the future to be, we may be blind to opportunities along the way.
sentences.cn: 然而，盲目的信仰也有它的局限，因为如果我们仅仅把注意力放在对将来的设想上，我们会对一路上的机会视而不见。

sentences.c: Sometimes, you have to be blind to jump into some of these things, but when you see your daughter in some of these women... you see the human side more clearly than before.
sentences.cn: 但当你看到你的女儿也在那些女人中间，你会看到更多人性的一面。

synos.cn: 不了解，对…是盲目的；对…视而不见；看不懂

trans.cn: 接近事实：说或写的话很接近事实，可能会冒犯一些人。

sentences.c: I'm very much a family man and need to be close to those I love.
sentences.cn: 我其实确是个顾家男人，需要在我所爱的人身边生活。

sentences.c: It's dangerous to be close to a crocodile.
sentences.cn: 靠近鳄鱼很危险。

sentences.c: In this way, you will have chances to be close to nature.
sentences.cn: 这样，你就有机会接近大自然。

trans.cn: 对……残忍：对某人或某物表现出残忍、无情或恶劣的行为。

sentences.c: He used a phrase I hate: "You have to be cruel to be kind."
sentences.cn: 他用了一句我讨厌的习语：“要想善良，就得残忍。”

sentences.c: We shouldn't be cruel to animals.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该对动物残忍。

sentences.c: As long as humans are cruel to animals, they will be cruel to each other.
sentences.cn: 只要人类对动物残酷，他们必然彼此残忍。

trans.cn: 致力于，专心于，献身于：指对某事物或某人有强烈的忠诚和奉献，全身心地投入其中。

sentences.c: The report recommends that more resources be devoted to teaching four-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 该报告建议投入更多的资源用于4岁儿童的教育。

sentences.c: The final term will be devoted to project work.
sentences.cn: 最后一学期的时间将全部用于专题研究。

sentences.c: There are environmental benefits, too: renting a car when you need it, rather than owning one, means fewer cars are required and fewer resources must be devoted to making them.
sentences.cn: 还有环境方面的好处：在需要的时候租一辆车，而不是购买一辆，意味着汽车的需求量更少，用于制造汽车的资源也更少。

trans.cn: 相等，等于：在数量、数字或大小上相同。

sentences.c: She was determined that she would be equal to any test the corporation put to them.
sentences.cn: 她决意要成功应对该公司对他们的任何考验。

sentences.c: They may not be equal to people's contributions.
sentences.cn: 它们也许与人们的贡献不匹配。

sentences.c: Economics is precise about the tax that should, in principle, be levied to deal with negative externalities: the tax on a liter of fuel should be equal to the harm caused by using a liter of fuel.
sentences.cn: 从经济学的角度来看，为了应对负外部性，原则上应该征收的税收是准确的：对一升燃料征收的税应该等于使用一升燃料所造成的危害。

sentences.c: The tags should be familiar to HTML developers.
sentences.cn: HTML开发人员一定要熟悉标记。

sentences.c: Other UI features will be familiar to OS X users.
sentences.cn: 苹果用户将会对其他的界面功能相对熟悉一些。

sentences.c: Most of the operations in Listing 6 will be familiar to you.
sentences.cn: 清单6中的大多数操作应该都是您熟悉的。

sentences.c: Fruit juices can be harmful to children's teeth.
sentences.cn: 果汁可能损坏儿童的牙齿。

sentences.c: The hatred will be harmful to your heart.
sentences.cn: 仇恨会伤害你的心灵。

sentences.c: Too much screen time may be harmful to your health.
sentences.cn: 对着屏幕时间过长可能对你的健康有害。

trans.cn: 对……很重要：表示某事对某人或某事物非常重要或有影响。

sentences.c: This will be important to try and understand the French revolution, "La Revolution Francaise", that there's a difference between absolutism and despotism.
sentences.cn: 这对于尝试理解法国大革命很重要，“La Revolution Francaise”，即绝对主义和专制主义是有区别的。

sentences.c: What other things might be important to you?
sentences.cn: 还有没有其他事情对你来说也是很重要的呢？

sentences.c: That's always going to be important to understanding this work.
sentences.cn: 这一点对于理解这部作品很重要。

trans.cn: 对……持开放态度：愿意接受或考虑某种观点、建议或想法。

sentences.c: The show will be open to the public at 2 pm; admission will be $5.
sentences.cn: 展览将于下午2点对公众开放；入场费为$5。

sentences.c: Her interpretation of the facts may be open to doubt.
sentences.cn: 她对事实的解释可能有待质疑。

sentences.c: Nanjing Zijinshan Insect Museum, which will be open to the public soon, was formed at the foot of Zhongshan on April 2nd.
sentences.cn: 4月2日，即将对外开放的南京紫金山昆虫博物馆在中山山脚下正式成立。

sentences.c: "How can one be opposed to what is taking place before one's eyes each moment of the day"?
sentences.cn: 人怎能抵制每日每时发生在眼前的事物呢？

sentences.c: If there was a way of extracting the stem cells without destroying them, I would not be opposed to it.
sentences.cn: 如果有一条可以不毁灭胚胎而提取干细胞的途径，我就不会反对。

sentences.c: A: it's a great example of how this technology can be used to save lives, relieve pain and suffering and improve the human condition. How can anyone be opposed to that?
sentences.cn: 答：这是转基因技术可以用于拯救生命、减轻病痛与苦难而改善人类生存状况的极好例子，怎么可能有人会反对它呢？

trans.cn: 与……相反：指两个事物或概念在某种方面完全相反或对立。

sentences.c: Let a cherry premier if after slumbering bottom, I and he be opposite to sit, again compotation quite a few cup wine.
sentences.cn: 先让樱若睡下之后，我和他相对坐着，又共饮了好几杯酒。

sentences.c: Viewed from the side, the pagoda seemed to be doing a snake dance—with each consecutive floor moving in the opposite direction to its neighbours above and below.
sentences.cn: 从侧面看，这座宝塔就像在跳蛇舞——每一层楼都朝着上下相邻楼层相反的方向移动。

sentences.c: Body language can also be used to attract members of the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 肢体语言也可以被用来吸引异性。

trans.cn: 对……有礼貌：表现出对某人的尊重和友好，不使用冒犯性的语言或行为。

sentences.c: If we can be polite to strangers, why can't we do the same for the ones we love?
sentences.cn: 如果我们可以对陌生人礼貌，为什么我们不能对我们所爱的人礼貌呢？

sentences.c: She forced herself to be polite to them.
sentences.cn: 她对他们强装客气。

sentences.c: Take it easy and be polite to criticism.
sentences.cn: 放轻松，礼貌地评论。

trans.cn: 与……有关：指两个或多个事物之间存在某种联系或关联。

sentences.c: It is thought to be related to food consumption.
sentences.cn: 它被认为与食物消费有关。

sentences.c: Innovative science produces new propositions in terms of which diverse phenomena can be related to one another in more coherent ways.
sentences.cn: 创新科学会产生新的命题，使不同的现象以更连贯的方式相互关联。

sentences.c: In the future, pay increases will be related to productivity.
sentences.cn: 以后，工资的增加将和业绩挂钩。

sentences.c: I think the most important thing is to be respectful to the judges but not obsequious.
sentences.cn: 我觉得重要的是要尊重法官而不是对他拍马屁。

sentences.c: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any, also to strangers, and sometimes to others.
sentences.cn: 若有上级，要尊敬他们，尊重陌生人，有时也要尊重其他人。

sentences.c: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any, also to strangers, and sometimes to others.
sentences.cn: 对待上司要尊重，要是你们有了上司；

trans.cn: 对……粗鲁无礼：不礼貌地对待某人或对某人表现出粗鲁的行为或态度。

sentences.c: Mexicans may use silence when instructions are given by a person in authority rather than be rude to that person by arguing with him or her.
sentences.cn: 当权威人士下达指令时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默，而不是粗鲁地与之争吵。

sentences.c: However, Mexicans may use silence when instructions are given by a person in authority rather than be rude to that person by arguing with him or her.
sentences.cn: 然而，当权威人士给出指令时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默，而不是粗鲁地与对方争吵。

sentences.c: You couldn't actually be rude to them, but you couldn't help feeling about them the same way that, say, a Vietnam veteran would feel about someone who wears combat gear to Neighborhood Watch meetings.
sentences.cn: 你没办法冲他们发火，但始终有种怪怪的感觉。 就好像一个越战老兵看到有人穿着战斗服参加邻里互助会时的感觉一样。

trans.cn: 类似于：具有相似的特征、性质或特点。

sentences.c: Wu said it would be similar to how we get moonlight, but he predicted that the man-made moon would have eight times the brightness of the real one.
sentences.cn: 吴说，这将类似于我们获得月亮光照的方式，但他预测，人造月亮的亮度将是真实月亮的8倍。

sentences.c: Your file will be similar to Listing 5.
sentences.cn: 您的文件将类似清单5。

sentences.c: Your output should be similar to Listing 2.
sentences.cn: 您的输出应该与请单2所示类似。

trans.cn: 忠于，忠实于，遵守：指对某个原则、信念或价值观保持忠诚，不背离或违背。

sentences.c: Be true to yourself in all things.
sentences.cn: 在任何事情上都要忠于自己。

sentences.c: "No," said the Sultan, "I will be true to my master."
sentences.cn: “不，”苏丹说，“我要忠于我的主人。”

sentences.c: The key is to be true to reality, which is also one of the main themes in the course.
sentences.cn: 关键是要真实面对现实，这也是本门课的重要主题之一。

trans.cn: 习惯于：适应某种情况或行为方式。

sentences.c: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这类外科手术甚至可以用来摘除恶性肿瘤。

sentences.c: It cannot be used to bond wood to metal.
sentences.cn: 这不能把木料粘贴在金属上。

sentences.c: The money will be used to repair faulty equipment.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将被用来修理出故障的设备。

trans.cn: 对……有用：表示某物对某人或某事物有益处或帮助。

sentences.c: It can be useful to write a short summary of your argument first.
sentences.cn: 先把你的论点纲要写下来可能会有帮助。

sentences.c: He might be useful to us.
sentences.cn: 我们也许用得上他。

sentences.c: A tripod will be useful to align and steady the camera.
sentences.cn: 三脚架会有助于对齐稳住照相机。
